Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Bay City in 1978...
Injured on 7/29/1978 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1980, off Antonio Sanchez (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1980, off James Wines (CBC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1981, hitting .368 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 6/12/1982...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1982, hitting .323 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Columbus on 8/31/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1984, hitting .448 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1984, hitting .409 with 1 HR, 17 RBI...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1985, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/1/1986 to a 5-year deal worth $7,027,800 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1986, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1986, hitting .356 with 8 HR, 22 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Malibu on 4/8/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1987, hitting .389 with 5 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1987, hitting .313 with 11 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/7/1987, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 7/29/1987 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 6/15/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1988, hitting .481 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1988, hitting .330 with 5 HR, 27 RBI...
